short_summary: One (1) Engineer position for 5.4 Professional Engineer - Intermediate
description: Services of 1 x Professional Engineer, Intermediate to provide Task and Solutions Professional Services to Fisheries and Oceans Canada.
tags: Government of Canada - Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC/TPSGC)
Requests for Proposals for Services, Consulting Engineering Services
Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
====================================

**One (1) 5.4 Professional Engineer - Intermediate**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01026119

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Publication Date:** February 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023, 1:00 PM AST

**Synopsis:** This bid solicitation cancels and replaces previous bid solicitation number 30003434 dated February 3, 2023, with a closing date of February 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM AST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

**Procurement Requirements:**
-----------------------------

This requirement is for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support the Fish and Fish Habitat Protection Program of Fisheries and Oceans Canada. The requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following stream: 5.4 Professional Engineer - Intermediate.

**Eligible Bidders:**
-------------------

The following Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

*   7351933 Canada Inc
*   ADGA Group Consultants Inc
*   AECOM Canada Ltd
*   AES ENGINEERING LTD
*   Calian Ltd
*   CBCL Limited
*   CHANT LIMITED
*   Deloitte Inc
*   Dunn Engineering Inc
*   Louis Tanguay Informatique Inc
*   Michael Wager Consulting Inc
*   Modis Canada Inc
*   Norda Stelo Inc
*   OLAV CONSULTING CORP, MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
*   Orbis Risk Consulting Inc
*   Orbis Risk Consulting Inc, Okwaho Management Resources Inc, IN JOINT VENTURE
*   Planifika Inc
*   Posterity Group Consulting Inc
*   Promaxis Systems Inc
*   Reticle Ventures Canada Incorporated
*   Thomas&Schmidt Inc
*   Tiree Facility Solutions Inc
*   V42 Management Consulting, Inc
*   Valcom Consulting group Inc
*   WSP Canada Inc

**Period of Contract:**
---------------------

The proposed period of contract shall be from April 1, 2023, to October 31, 2023,
